topic.title: What's In the MIS Documentation Set

dd.p: This section tells you about other guides in the MIS documentation set that describe connectors, and shows you where to look for more MIS Documentation..
The table below shows you the other guides that make up the MIS Connector documentation set.

stentry.CellBody: guidelines on writing code above the connector level, rather than generating it in MIS Enterprise Studio.
guidelines on writing code above the connector level, rather than generating it in MIS Enterprise Studio.

dd.p: For a look at all documentation available see the MIS Documentation Roadmap.
For more information on using MIS products, contact the MIS Support Team at:
